message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
Let's meet in the middle, Alice!
You're getting closer to the middle, Bob! But I'm still not there yet.
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. Let's try again!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a better deal to make it worth my while.
I'm willing to give a bit more, Alice. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
